meanings.definition: Comparative form of kvetch: complaining or whining more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She is kvetchier than her sister when it comes to chores.
meanings.sent2: The kvetchier customer demanded to speak to the manager.
meanings.sent3: The kvetchier puppy barked at every passing car, much to the amusement of the neighbors.
meanings.sent4: His kvetchier attitude cast a dark cloud over the otherwise cheerful gathering.
meanings.sent5: The kvetchier tone in her voice made it clear she was not pleased.
